title: "Read GPS data directly from server"
output: 
  pdf_document: 
    fig_height: 6
---

  

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library("jsonlite")
library(anytime)
GPS1 <- jsonlite::fromJSON('https://client.trusted.dk/Public/GetTrail?key=oGpy6z41mAOjI35p&id=88462&skip=0&count=100')

```

```{r}
lon <- GPS1$Longitude
lat <- GPS1$Latitude
UTC <- anytime(GPS1$UnixTimestampUtc/1000)
```
